list-item.p:
Physical protection of workers is effective. There is no treatment (although supportive treatment is available) and no vaccine.
52, 53
Dead birds transmit the disease. There is no human-to-human transmission.
CFR varies from 4% to 14% (14% in severe cases among the elderly).
Regarding mortality, 50 deaths were reported in Europe between January 1 and November 30, 2019.
Workers in contact with dead animals are the main victims of the virus.
In 2018, 1,548 cases were reported in Europe.
